[00:00.00]maybe (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)/Bring Me The Horizon
[00:02.65]Lyrics by：Travis Barker/Omer Fedi/Nick Long/Colson Baker/Stephen Basil/Brandon Allen/Oliver Sykes/Jordan Fish
[00:05.30]Composed by：Travis Barker/Omer Fedi/Nick Long/Colson Baker/Stephen Basil/Brandon Allen/Oliver Sykes/Jordan Fish
[00:07.96]Machine Gun Kelly：
[00:08.21]That's hard
[00:09.19]Two three five
[00:10.08]
[00:21.50]Maybe if I had something to say
[00:23.15]
[00:24.02]Butterfly effect from the last three days now
[00:26.77]Maybe if I had something to save
[00:28.61]
[00:29.38]I used to have a soul until I threw it away
[00:31.92]There's shadows on the wall wish I would've ran
[00:34.27]Yeah
[00:34.97]Gotta get away I hope you understand
[00:37.01]Ah-ahh
[00:37.62]I try to hide my face like a wanted man
[00:39.75]Yeah
[00:40.44]Maybe I'll be gone before you count to ten
[00:43.03]I made up my mind this evening
[00:46.28]I'm taking the last I'm taking the last
[00:49.04]Drink while my conscience eats me
[00:51.82]I'm taking the last I'm taking the last
[00:54.46]
[00:55.41]I'm ready to let you go
[00:58.07]I'm ready to let you go
[01:00.70]I'm ready to let you go
[01:02.51]This time is the last this time is the last
[01:05.37]
[01:06.97]Oli Sykes/Machine Gun Kelly：
[01:08.91]
[01:10.33]Maybe if we went another way
[01:12.08]Another way
[01:13.02]I wouldn't be regretting the decisions that I made
[01:15.52]Ah
[01:15.87]I don't want to spend another day
[01:17.57]Another day
[01:18.62]Looking for somebody that I know I can't replace
[01:20.99]My tears fall you don't miss me
[01:24.01]Put me out my misery
[01:26.80]Think my heart is history
[01:29.64]I think I'm broken nothing could fix me
[01:31.97]Machine Gun Kelly/Oli Sykes：
[01:32.62]I made up my mind this evening
[01:35.36]I'm taking the last I'm taking the last
[01:38.13]Drink while my conscience eats me
[01:40.77]I'm taking the last I'm taking the last
[01:43.64]
[01:44.53]I'm ready to let you go
[01:47.11]I'm ready to let you go
[01:49.77]I'm ready to let you go
[01:51.56]This time is the last this time is the last
[01:54.04]Oli Sykes/Machine Gun Kelly：
[01:54.68]Yeah
[01:55.27]
[01:56.27]Maybe
[01:57.01]Woah woah woah woah
[01:57.95]We were built to fall apart
[01:59.73]Woah woah woah woah
[02:02.33]But I can't feel you now
[02:04.44]Woah woah woah woah
[02:05.03]And it's too late now
[02:05.85]There's no point screaming
[02:07.87]Dug your grave so f**k your feelings
[02:10.63]No one's here so now you're on your own
[02:14.23]Machine Gun Kelly/Oli Sykes：
[02:15.37]
[02:15.89]I made up my mind this evening
[02:18.93]I'm taking the last I'm taking the last

[ti:maybe (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/Bring Me The Horizon]
[al:maybe (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.65]//
[00:05.30]//
[00:07.96]//
[00:08.21]这很艰难
[00:09.19]二 三 五
[00:10.08]
[00:21.50]或许如果我有什么话要说
[00:23.15]
[00:24.02]过去三天的事情引发了蝴蝶效应 现在
[00:26.77]或许如果我有什么需要拯救的
[00:28.61]
[00:29.38]曾经我也拥有灵魂 直到我将它丢弃
[00:31.92]墙上有块块阴影 真希望我已经逃离
[00:34.27]//
[00:34.97]必须要离开 我希望你明白
[00:37.01]//
[00:37.62]我试图像通缉犯一样隐姓埋名
[00:39.75]//
[00:40.44]或许在你数到十之前 我就会离开
[00:43.03]今晚我下定了决心
[00:46.28]我要做出最后的努力 我要做出最后的努力
[00:49.04]在我因良知而煎熬的时候 借酒消愁
[00:51.82]我要做出最后的努力 我要做出最后的努力
[00:54.46]
[00:55.41]我准备好放你走了
[00:58.07]我准备好放你走了
[01:00.70]我准备好放你走了
[01:02.51]这一次是最后一次 这一次是最后一次
[01:05.37]
[01:06.97]//
[01:08.91]
[01:10.33]或许如果我们当初的选择不同
[01:12.08]选择不同
[01:13.02]我就不会后悔我曾经所做的决定
[01:15.52]//
[01:15.87]我不想第二天继续
[01:17.57]第二天继续
[01:18.62]寻找某个我明知自己无法取代的人
[01:20.99]我的眼泪滑落 你不想念我
[01:24.01]让我摆脱我的痛苦
[01:26.80]我觉得我的心记住了一切
[01:29.64]我觉得自己残破不堪 没有什么能够治愈
[01:31.97]//
[01:32.62]今晚我下定了决心
[01:35.36]我要做出最后的努力 我要做出最后的努力
[01:38.13]在我因良知而煎熬的时候 借酒消愁
[01:40.77]我要做出最后的努力 我要做出最后的努力
[01:43.64]
[01:44.53]我准备好放你走了
[01:47.11]我准备好放你走了
[01:49.77]我准备好放你走了
[01:51.56]这一次是最后一次 这一次是最后一次
[01:54.04]//
[01:54.68]//
[01:55.27]
[01:56.27]或许
[01:57.01]//
[01:57.95]我们注定会分开
[01:59.73]//
[02:02.33]但现在我对你没有感觉了
[02:04.44]//
[02:05.03]现在为时过晚了
[02:05.85]尖叫也没什么意义
[02:07.87]你自掘了坟墓 所以少给我装深情
[02:10.63]没有人在你身边了 所以现在你是独自一人
[02:14.23]//
[02:15.37]
[02:15.89]今晚我下定了决心
[02:18.93]我要做出最后的努力 我要做出最后的努力
[02:21.73]在我因良知而煎熬的时候 借酒消愁
[02:24.49]我要做出最后的努力 我要做出最后的努力
[02:27.04]
[02:28.15]我准备好放你走了
[02:30.69]我准备好放你走了
[02:33.40]我准备好放你走了
